element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm takes a points layer as input and calculates a new raster layer with distances from each cell to the closest point from that cell. This could be calculated using the Accumulated cost module and using a constant cost layer (with cost = cellsize). However, this algorithm uses a more precise approach, calculating the exact euclidean distance from each cell to the closest point.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output layer with euclidean distances from each cell to the closest point
